评论详情: The size runs short, the material is nice and the shape is flattering IF it were the right fit.  I bought the XL which was just a little too snug so I returned the dress.  The material, as I said, is very nice, nice quality too.

I bought the "white" dress in large. The print is very pretty. The bodice is a bit snug for the 41.7 inch indicated on the size chart. The rest of the dress fits and looks nice.  I do not want to go up a size in fear the arm holes will be too big.

评论概述: Thin and cute fabric, but not the right cut for me, the waist is not in a flattering place
评论详情: Except for the fact that the material is very thin and the waist makes this unattractive on me, it may be great for the right body shape.

I live in south Florida and needed a sundress for a graduation party.  This dress is perfect.  The fabric is light weight, no sheer.  It's a woven print rayon.  I'll wash in gentle and hang dry.  I ordered the Medium.  I'm 5ft-6inches, 148 lbs.  Shapely.  That's why I like the draw string above the waist but under the bust , one can make it tight or loose.  It's a nice tummy hider.  I probably will remove the decorate buttons. Nice dress for price.
Fit was snug. Fabric very thin and dress cheaply made. Slit was VERY high. However, dress looks exactly like the photo otherwise.  The color and print on the fabric is very pretty.
The dress is light and summery, but the chest is super small. Ordered two sizes larger.  Cute.
Dress matches description and it is fun to wear.  Lightweight, flouncy, sizing was accurate, and will order another.
Cute print, breathable but some fraying hems.

评论概述: Weird sizing but nice dress for the price
评论详情: I find the sizing hard to get right - I am normally a medium but Amazon suggested a large, but even that wasn't great - it fit but I wanted the skirt to be a bit fuller, so exchanged for an XL - that is a tad better.  But the print is nice and the way it lays is nice.
I love the colors, the prints and the quality of fabric.  It is too small for my bra size. Oh well.  I recommend for anyone except for "full figured" in the chest area.

评论概述: Too sheer for me but pretty
评论详情: Loved the pretty red color!  Was a bit tight through the bust so if you are busty, size up. The material was too thin and sheer for me. But someone younger would probably love it!

Have 3 of these dresses - pink, teal and yellow. I am 5’5”, 124 lbs., 36c, fit and young at heart 62 year old. Purchased size medium and they fit perfectly. All were washed in cold water, hung to dry and no major wrinkling that can’t be cured with a bit of wrinkle spray.  Love everything about these dresses, the material, prints, tassels….they fit comfortably and the length is perfect for what I was looking for. I have enough shorter dresses and wanted a little longer. They are boho, flow nicely and definitely not frumpy. I bought these dresses for upcoming travel to Egypt and to wear at home. Wore one to a BBQ and received many compliments. They will pack well and should be great for travel.  Update - wore these dresses on my Egypt trip and they worked out perfectly, even in 115 degrees! They packed well and I just used a little wrinkle spray. Also got lots of compliments.  Highly recommend theses for travel.
Very pretty, the fabric felt nice. The waist band is too tight for me.

评论概述: Shrank at least a 1 1/2 size on the first wash
评论详情: Loved the loose flowy fit of this dress right out of the bag, in yellow, loved the lack of elastic, ordered another one from the same listing, in red, based on the comfy fit and have not yet washed the red one. I wore the yellow a couple times before washing.  I washed it in luke warm water, gentle cycle, tumbled with no heat and then hung it to dry in my 69 degree bathroom.  I could not have treated this garment with more care!  It shrunk SIGNIFIGANTLY!  The top is now fully form fitting where it hung off of me in a perfectly relaxed and flowy fit before.  NOT HAPPY!  Excessive shrinkage is a mark of poor quality and should be disclosed to the buyer, size up.  So now I am afraid to wash the red one.  Also, FYI, the yellow has a draw string, no elastic and no pockets. The red has elastic, no draw string, and it does have pockets.  So even though it's lumped into one listing, look very carefully as the different dresses have different features.

I am 5’4” and 129 lbs. I normally wear a larger size 8 or a smaller size 10.  followed the size guide and ordered a medium.  It was way too big.  I exchanged it for a small and it fits perfect.  Pretty summer dress.

Colors are very pretty, and I really wanted to like this dress.  I'm short (5'3") - perhaps that is why it did not look right?  Waist hit me wrong as well, and it was strangely tight in the chest (I'm small busted).  Sadly, I will be returning.

This dress is lightweight and flattering but beware and only wash in cold and hang to dry. I bought this dress in another color and it shranked when I dried it in the drier. But I liked it so much that I ordered another one. I am a size 38c in bra size and bought an XL and it fits me prefect!

The color is beautiful, the fabric is I believe cotton or rayon, either way, light and fresh, perfect for summer.  However, the armholes are too big.  This seems to be a trend these days.  Also, may not be flattering on someone who is larger around the middle.

The dress is pretty. Material is made mostly of cotton. It is very light, cool but not see-thru. The dress shrunk by a size after I hand washed in cold water then hang to dry. I am 5'4, 123 lbs, I ordered a medium and I'm glad I did seeing that the dress fits like a small after washing. Size up ladies!

评论概述: Cute dress but not true to size
评论详情: Loved the pattern and color of the dress. However it's too small in chest area. Am 40 in chest, so I ordered the x large and it was too tight, even without bra. So disappointed in that part.

This dress  not only fits well and flows beautifully. It is quite flattering. I bought the navy blue one about a month ago and I liked it so much. I ordered the yellow one. Not top-notch quality, however, for the price it is definitely worth it.

I really liked this dress. I bought the black and the print is beautiful - deep colors - and the fabric is lightweight without being too sheer. The medium was the correct size for me at 5'4", 140lb, but I have a long torso and the waist hit me two inches too high, making me look thicker than I am. So I'm returning it. But if you are short-waisted, go for it!
Great colors, fabric and fit. Will wear this one often.

I ordered a small and i am 5'-3", 130 lbs.  Normally a size 4 in womens dress size.  The dress fit perfectly.  It has a draw string waist which is nice so it is adjustable.  Very comfortable summer time dress.  The material is thin but not see-thru which makes it cool for summer.  Have not washed it yet but suspect that it will shrink so plan on hang drying.  Will definitely need to be ironed.  I ordered this dress in the yellow and the turquoise.  Both very nice colors.  I was pleased because i don't order a lot of clothes on Amazon.  I ordered about 5 dressed and was hoping that one fit well but all have fit perfect.. so i have some choices to make.  Way easier than going to a store to shop!!!

Such a cute dress! I was delighted, until I tried it on. The sizes do not run true for an American woman; they are made for much smaller women. I usually wear a L or XL, but for this I would have needed at least a XXL. I returned it.
The dress is very short waisted and too short for me; I am 5’8””.
